alert.note: Alert for Logan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 4:59PM MDT until June 12 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 459 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of St Petersburg, or 14 miles east of Sterling, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Fleming and St Petersburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
